June 12, 2014

Monitoring multiple Resque instances, especially from a mobile phone browser, is a huge pain. That pain is now over. From the Stitch Fix blog

Today, weâ€™re introducing Resque Brain, an open source application that monitors multiple resque instances. It has a mobile-friendly UI, and provides better tools for managing the failed queue. It also includes some basic monitoring and statistics tasks.
